reviews.review_msg: He used a kinda roundabout way of explaining things. He seems nice on the surface level but he is a tough grader. I got the basics but as someone else said on here he marks on the specifics even though said specifics aren't on the slide or are but unnoticeable. Couldn't even find where or when he had office hours as the slides mentioned nothing.

I was not sure what to expect of Dr. Choy based on his low ratemyprof score. However I was pleasantly surprised and I believe he has significantly improved his teaching. His lectures are super clear, and his presentation made a ton of sense. You are graded purely off exams but they focus more on big picture and compared to other classes are doable.

Seems very unprepared when lecturing. Doesn't seem to know what is on his slides. Luckily lectures were recorded. Would have been a pain to commute to campus for an extremely dry lecture. It is easy to do well in this course if you're good at memorizing. Exam questions were very straight forward.

Dr. Choy usually just reads off the slides and doesn't provide too much more information beyond that. He can be a bit confusing at times when he teaches during lectures. There are very few sources that he provides in his classes that allow for extra practice, so you'll be stuck having to look for other sources. Not bad but provides the bare minimum

Talks way too much but isn't very clear about the information. Much confusion as he reads through his slides. Could be easily taught but speaks too much, making everything confusing. This could've been so interesting with the information but he makes it very boring. Makes it all about memorization and wastes too much time. Not conveniently taught.

She is the worst teacher I have had so far.  She is nice, but... her notes are disorganized... adds slides just before the lecture...(and doesn't add them to webct)... and doesn't give you enough time to copy them... but... she is the worst teacher simply because her exams are poorly written.
Does not know how to teach. She is everywhere with her lecture. Notes are really unorganized, but that goes for her as well. Her tests were way out there.

Notes are veri messy and herself too. My guess is that half the time, she doesn't know what she is saying herself. She laugh at her joke while everyone else dead silence. Exams are hard but do-able. Notes aren't really detailed, and comes A LOT of abbreviations. SO prepare to dig your textbook up if you plan to take this course.

Her exams are very unfair. There are some "choice" questions that are worth 6 marks??? She is a knowledgeable professor, but she just can't explain the material with clarity. I suggest an alternative prof, if possible, but I think she teaches half of this course every time.
for her unorganized notes...but she's a very nice person though...she just can't teach...
